timeline.author: bhathiya
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+/*

+ * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+ * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permissions and limitations
+ * under the License.
+ */
+
+package org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.api.model;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+public interface KeyManagerConnectorConfiguration {
+    public String getImplementation();
+    public String getJWTValidator();
+    public List<ConfigurationDto> getConnectionConfigurations();
+    public List<ConfigurationDto> getApplicationConfigurations();

timeline.author: bhathiya

timeline.message: add consumer key and scope as a seperate claims
add tenant wise key manager support
add validation on key manager configuration
add multiple keymanager token validation support
add api level key manager support
add application level support to multiple key managers
add jwt validator to support with multiple key manager
add changes to admin v1 and internal api
add Key Manager Configuration retrival in store
add changes according to select api level key manager
change scope related table according to keymanager
Add Connector Configuration Abstraction to read json
add consumer key and scope as a seperate claims
